name: Greenies greenies Bundle Pack Pill Pocket Tablet for Dogs (3 Pack) Flavored Dog Treats (90 Tablets) Bundle (Variety Bundle)
short_description: Greenies
Greenies greenies Bundle Pack Pill Pocket Tablet for Dogs (3 Pack) Flavored Dog Treats (90 Tablets) Bundle (Variety Bundle)
PET_FOOD
product_description: Greenies Pill Pockets for Dogs Peanut Butter Tablet Size Soft Dog Treats take the hassle out of giving your pup their medicine. Made with real peanut butter, natural ingredients, minerals, and trace nutrients, these ingenious soft treats turn pill time into treat time. Plus, the small-sized, tablet pill pockets are suitable for both large and small breeds. Simply drop a tablet into the soft, small treat, pinch the top to close, give it to your pooch, and watch their medicine disappear. Greenies Pill Pockets dog treats are the easy way to give your canine companion their meds—and they’ll never know the difference. Ingenious dog treats have a built-in pouch and shapeable texture—perfect for hiding medicine capsules. These small, tablet-size pill wraps make taking their medicine a positive experience for your pup. Features a dog-licious peanut butter flavor that masks the taste of the medicine. So easy to use—just drop the medicine tablet inside the pill pouch, pinch it closed, and give your pooch a tasty snack. Proudly crafted in USA facilities with quality ingredients from around the world.

name: Flavor-Doh - Flavored Pill Wrap for Dogs to Hide Capsules and Create Pill Treats for Dogs - Easy-to-Use Treat Paste for Pet Medication - Peanut Butter (4.2oz)
short_description: Wrap & Hide - Struggles with dog pills are over. Our soft, moldable dog treat paste wraps smoothly around any capsule, transforming them into dog treats to hide medicine for easy, mess-free dosing.
Irresistible Peanut Butter - This delicious pill paste for dogs turns into a soft dog treats to hide pills, helping disguise medication for a stress-free experience.
Low-Calorie Option – Made for everyday use, this pliable dog pill wrap shapes easily to create custom pockets and pouches for capsules, offering a low-calorie pill hider for dogs.
How to Use – Simply pinch, shape, and wrap the pill with this soft dog paste until fully enclosed. Great for creating custom dog pill treats for different-sized medication.
Made in USA – Proudly manufactured in USA, Pack Approved Flavor Doh ensures top-quality ingredients and standards to support safe, consistent dog pill delivery with our moldable pill wraps for dogs.

Each Pill Treat has a built-in pill tube so it's easy to hide a tablet or capsule. Delighted by the chicken flavor, pets don't notice the medication inside. Pill Treats are also a great training treat. So instead of it being a chore, you can give your dog medication and supplements the smart, easy and fun way with VetIQ Pill Treats.

short_description: Contains Six (6) 3.2-Oz., 30-Count Packs Of Greenies Pill Pockets Treats For Dogs With Real Peanut Butter - Tablet Size
The #1 Vet-Recommended Choice For Giving Medicine*
Masks The Taste And Smell Of Capsules And Liquid Medication With A Real Peanut Butter Flavor
A Low-Calorie, Healthier Alternative To Human Food
Easy To Use; Simply Fill, Pinch, And Give
product_description: Pets are smart about avoiding their meds, but you're smarter. Designed and recommended by vets, GREENIES PILL POCKETS Treats for Dogs make it easy to give your dog medicine. Don't hide medicine in human foods, such as peanut butter or cheese. Give a healthy, low-calorie dog treat instead. GREENIES PILL POCKETS Treats take the stress and mess out of administering tablets or liquid medication to your dog. Our easy-to-use pouches mask the smell and taste of medicine and deliver a real peanut butter flavor your dog will love. * GREENIES Brand is the number-one vet-recommended choice for giving medicine (Data on File, The Nutro Company 2015)

Directions Feed as a treat. FILL: Hold PILL POCKETS Treat with your thumb and forefinger; insert medicine. PINCH: Using the same hand to hold the PILL POCKETS Treat, squeeze the top half closed. GIVE: The PILL POCKETS Treat is now sealed, and you can feed it to your dog. ATTENTION: To prevent transfer of the medicine's smell and taste, do not touch the PILL POCKETS Treat with the hand that held the medicine.

name: Pet MD Wrap-A-Pill with Dog Probiotics - Pill Wrap for Dogs Medicine - Easy-to-Use Paste to Hide Capsules, Create Pockets and Treats for Dogs - Bacon (4.2oz)
short_description: Conceal with Ease: Effortlessly hide your dog medicine using our pliable dog pill wrap. Designed to be moldable like putty, it fits any pill size and offers a convenient way to administer medication with no mess.
Delicious Bacon Flavor: With a mouthwatering bacon flavor, the Wrap-a-Pill doubles as delectable dog pill treats, enticing even the pickiest eaters and ensuring stress-free medication administration.

Probiotic Infusion: Our pill wrap for dogs aren’t just for hiding dog supplements & vitamins - they also contain probiotics for your dog’s digestive health and immune support for a happy, healthy furry friend.
How to Use: Simply pinch off a portion, wrap it around the pill like a pouch, and let your dog enjoy medication time.
Made in USA: Our dog pill paste is made in the USA, prioritizing quality and safety. Sourced and manufactured locally, they adhere to high standards and ensure your pet receives top-notch care.

product_description: Try a deliciously simple way to disguise your dog's pills with Milk-Bone Pill Pouches. Just fill, pinch and give! Made for dogs of all sizes, these hickory smoked bacon flavor chewy dog treats fit most capsules and tablets. They’re designed to mold around the outside of pills to hide the taste and smell of the medication, and treat your dog to a taste they love instead. Plus, these wholesome and tasty pill pouches for dogs are made with real chicken as the number one ingredient, and they contain no by-products, meals or fillers — now that’s something to feel good about! Order a bag today and make pill-giving a tasty and rewarding experience.
